lyrics.text: Shouldn't Have to Be Like That - Fra Lippo Lippi
lyrics.pairlyric: 以下歌词翻译由文曲大模型提供

lyrics.text: Composed by：Fra Lippo Lippi
It's always like this people I know
lyrics.pairlyric: 总是这样，我认识的人们

lyrics.text: Read many books and save every dream
lyrics.pairlyric: 读了许多书，珍藏每一个梦想

lyrics.text: With all of their hope buried inside somewhere
lyrics.pairlyric: 将所有的希望深埋心底

lyrics.text: And somewhere a man cries for his love
lyrics.pairlyric: 某处有个男人为他的爱哭泣

lyrics.text: A love that is lost that withered too soon
With all of his hope buried inside somewhere
lyrics.pairlyric: 将所有的希望深埋心底

lyrics.text: Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
So all you can say is we need more time
lyrics.pairlyric: 所以你只能说我们需要更多时间

lyrics.text: To get through the things that need to be said
lyrics.pairlyric: 去解决那些需要说出口的事情

lyrics.text: With all our trust buried inside somewhere
lyrics.pairlyric: 我们所有的信任都被深埋在某处

lyrics.text: And even if it takes a lifetime of trust
To build something strong what happens to us
lyrics.pairlyric: 去建立坚固的感情 我们又会怎样

lyrics.text: With all our faith buried inside somewhere
lyrics.pairlyric: 我们所有的信念深埋在某处

lyrics.text: Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to do like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
No it shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
No no no
Shouldn't have to be like that
Shouldn't have to be like that
